title: SmartTask Backend API
description: Task Management API with secure user authentication and CRUD operations, built with Flask, PostgreSQL, SQLalchemy, Redis, and Celery.

title: Attendance Analysis System
description: Python-based application to analyze student engagement in classes using data science techniques and an interactive web interface.

title: Cloud Solutions with AWS
description: Implemented cloud solutions using AWS services like EC2, S3, and Lambda for smooth and reliable application deployment.
